CustomField.description: Req #3744 : Shows Data Quality Predictive Issues
CustomField.formula: IF(Opportunity__r.Data_Quality_Plan_Date_PREDICTIVE__c, IF(Data_Quality_Past_Due_PREDICTIVE__c, IF(OR((TODAY()-(DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)))>90, (DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date) - DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)) >= 90),'All 3 DQI Predictive Issues', 'Past Gate & Past Due Predictive'), IF(OR((TODAY()-(DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)))>90, (DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date) - DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)) >= 90),'Past Gate & Last Modified Predictive','Past Gate Predictive Only') ), IF(Data_Quality_Past_Due_PREDICTIVE__c, IF(OR((TODAY()-(DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)))>90, (DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date) - DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)) >= 90),'Past Due & Last Modified Predictive','Past Due Predictive Only'), IF(OR((TODAY()-(DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)))>90, (DATEVALUE($Label.Current_Period_End_Date) - DATEVALUE(Opportunity__r.Last_User_Modified__c)) >= 90),'Last Modified Predictive Only','No DQ Predictive Issues')))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Info PREDICTIVE
